nodes.text: The absorption by China of Siberian chemical metallurgical and energy products will play a big role as a market to support the development of Russia's Eastern Region.
In the inevitable economic recovery which Russia will have in the early 21st century China will be a great market unmatched by the West

From the long-term view the massive energy development projects in the next century already agreed upon will be an important source of supply for China's even greater energy demands in the early 21st century.
If Russia is geographically more advantaged than the West on the Chinese market the West cannot compete with it
its consistent demand for the same product mix of Russian goods.
If Russia produces the same goods that China needs while the West does not China will be a great market for Russia
